directions: Cut the lemons in half and juice them using a citrus juicer or by hand using a fork or juicer.
Strain the lemon juice to remove any seeds or pulp.
In a pitcher, combine the lemon juice and water.
Stir well to mix the lemon juice and water together.
Taste and adjust the lemon juice to water ratio according to your preference.
Refrigerate the lemon juice until chilled.
Serve the lemon juice over ice and enjoy!
